value.title: This month in AWS Machine Learning: October edition
value.excerpt: Every day there is something new going on in the world of AWS Machine Learning—from launches to new to use cases to interactive trainings. value.title: NVIDIA Intros Jetson Nano 2GB Developer Kit for AI and Robotics Ed
value.excerpt: NVIDIA has introduced its new Jetson Nano 2GB Developer Kit, a new system designed for “learning, building and teaching AI and robotics.” The Linux-based system is built around a 128-core NVIDIA Maxwell GPU and a 1.43 GHz quad-core ARM A57 CPU.
